name: Overhaul
storyline:
Overhaul is a rogue-lite puzzle game that combines fast-paced action and quick logical thinking. As Ikalee, venture deep into the abandoned Power Plant to bring the power back to your village. A place that has now been taken over by hostile and mysterious life forms.

Solve logic-based puzzles in a fast-paced top-down action game. Dodge, pick up enemies, carry objects and outsmart the most vicious of situations. Get ready to face all-new challenges every time!

Each time you manage to reach the Core, the Power Plant shifts and generates new traps that you'll have to triumph from in your next ventures. Each room is different, pick a difficult one for better rewards or an easier one if you want a smoother ride. It's up to you to carve your own path through the Power Plant.

Grow stronger by spending the energy you've collected in the Energy Well. Unlock new abilities and gather powerful items in your journey.

Experiment and learn how the different entities interact with one another. Some will try to take you down but you can use them to your advantage.

Discover what lies inside the Power Plant alongside a carefully composed score that matches your progression. From moody melancholic ambiance to blood-pumping melodies!
summary: Solve your way through this fast-paced rogue-lite puzzle game and outwit unforgiving creatures as you venture into the mysterious Power Plant!
